flavorText: "C'mon, Boodigan, let's go see what kind of treasure this place has!"

foreignData.flavorText: „Komm, Boodigan, lass uns schauen, was für Schätze dieser Ort hat!"
foreignData.name: Sorglose Schweinehüterin
foreignData.text: Immer wenn die Sorglose Schweinehüterin angreift, kannst du {1}{G} bezahlen. Falls du dies tust, erzeuge einen getappten und angreifenden 2/2 grünen Wildschwein-Kreaturenspielstein.

foreignData.flavorText: "¡Venga, Colmillitos, vamos a ver qué tesoros hay en este lugar!".
foreignData.name: Domadora de jabalís despreocupada
foreignData.text: Siempre que la Domadora de jabalís despreocupada ataque, puedes pagar {1}{G}. Si lo haces, crea una ficha de criatura Jabalí verde 2/2 que está girada y atacando.

foreignData.flavorText: « Allez viens, Boodigan, allons voir ce qu'on peut trouver comme trésors dans cet endroit ! »
foreignData.name: Maîtresse-porcin insouciante
foreignData.text: À chaque fois que la Maîtresse-porcin insouciante attaque, vous pouvez payer {1}{G}. Si vous faites ainsi, créez un jeton de créature 2/2 verte Sanglier qui est engagé et attaquant.

foreignData.flavorText: "Coraggio, Boodigan, andiamo a vedere che tipo di tesori nasconde questo posto!"
foreignData.name: Domatrice di Suini Spensierata
foreignData.text: Ogniqualvolta la Domatrice di Suini Spensierata attacca, puoi pagare {1}{G}. Se lo fai, crea una pedina creatura Cinghiale 2/2 verde TAPpata e attaccante.

foreignData.flavorText: 「さあ、ブーディガン、この場所にどんな宝物があるのか見に行こう！」
foreignData.name: 呑気な豚使い
foreignData.text: 呑気な豚使いが攻撃するたび、あなたは{1}{G}を支払ってもよい。そうしたなら、緑の２/２の猪・クリーチャー・トークン１体を、タップ状態かつ攻撃している状態で生成する。
foreignData.type: クリーチャー — ノーム・レインジャー

foreignData.flavorText: "자, 부디간. 이곳에 어떤 보물들이 있을 지 한번 살펴보자고!"
foreignData.name: 속 편한 돼지조련사
foreignData.text: 속 편한 돼지조련사가 공격할 때마다, 당신은 {1}{G}를 지불할 수 있다. 그렇게 한다면, 탭되어 공격 중인 2/2 녹색 멧돼지 생물 토큰 한 개를 만든다.

foreignData.flavorText: "Bora, Boodigan! Vamos ver que tipo de tesouro tem aqui!"
foreignData.name: Domadora de Suínos Despreocupada
foreignData.text: Toda vez que Domadora de Suínos Despreocupada ataca, você pode pagar {1}{G}. Se fizer isso, crie uma ficha de criatura Javali verde 2/2 virada e atacando.

foreignData.flavorText: «Давай, Будиган, поглядим, что у нас тут за сокровища!»
foreignData.name: Беспечная Пастушка
foreignData.text: Каждый раз, когда Беспечная Пастушка атакует, вы можете заплатить {1}{G}. Если вы это делаете, создайте одну фишку существа 2/2 зеленый Вепрь повернутой и атакующей.

foreignData.flavorText: 「快跟上，布迪根，我们一起去看看这地方有什么宝贝！」
foreignData.name: 无忧驯猪师
foreignData.text: 每当无忧驯猪师攻击时，你可以支付{1}{G}。若你如此作，则派出一个2/2绿色野猪衍生生物，其为横置且正进行攻击。

foreignData.flavorText: 「快跟上，布迪根，我們一起去看看這地方有什麼寶貝！」
foreignData.name: 無憂馴豬師
foreignData.text: 每當無憂馴豬師攻擊時，你可以支付{1}{G}。若你如此作，則派出一個2/2綠色野豬衍生生物，其為橫置且正進行攻擊。

name: Carefree Swinemaster
originalText: Whenever Carefree Swinemaster attacks, you may pay {1}{G}. If you do, create a 2/2 green Boar creature token that's tapped and attacking.

rulings.text: While resolving Carefree Swinemaster's triggered ability, you can't pay the cost multiple times to create more than one token.
You choose which player or planeswalker is being attacked by the Boar token as it enters the battlefield. It doesn't have to be the same player or planeswalker that Carefree Swinemaster is attacking.

Although the token created is an attacking creature, it was never declared as an attacking creature. This means that abilities that trigger whenever a creature attacks won't trigger when it enters the battlefield attacking.

text: Whenever Carefree Swinemaster attacks, you may pay {1}{G}. If you do, create a 2/2 green Boar creature token that's tapped and attacking.
